title: Gamified Laboratory Safety Education Using AI Educational Robots

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific experimental procedures and safety regulations
context.additional_context: Laboratory safety education course for pre-service/in-service teachers utilizing AI robots and gamification, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain laboratory safety regulations with over 90% accuracy via gamified AI robot content based on the GAFCC model.
Learners can perform risk situation response procedures with over 80% accuracy in an AI robot simulation environment.
Learners can complete and submit a laboratory safety education scenario design project through collaborative assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
